title: Jesus Heals on the Sabbath and Calls Disciples
summary: Jesus heals a man with a withered hand on the Sabbath, stirring conflict with religious leaders. Crowds follow Him, and He appoints the twelve apostles. Jesus teaches about spiritual family, saying those who do Godâ€™s will are His true family.

faq.question: What is a key message in Mark 3?
faq.answer: It emphasizes the servant nature of Jesus and the power of faith in action.

faq.question: What does Mark 3 reveal about Jesus?
faq.answer: It shows His authority, compassion, and call to follow Him wholeheartedly.
